boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib

Class ConfigChessboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigChessboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    boofcv.struct.Configuration, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfigChessboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements boofcv.struct.Configuration
    Calibration parameters for chessboard style calibration grid.
    See Also:
    DetectChessboardFiducial, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • numRows

        public int numRows
        Number of squares tall the grid is. Target dependent.

      • numCols

        public int numCols
        Number of squares wide the grid is. Target dependent.

      • maximumCornerDistance

        public double maximumCornerDistance
        The maximum distance in pixels that two corners can be from each other. In well focused image this number can be only a few pixels. The default value has been selected to handle blurred images

      • thresholding

        public boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
        Configuration for thresholding the image

      • square

        public boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector square
        Configuration for square detector

      • refineWithCorners

        public boolean refineWithCorners
        If true then it only refines the corner region. Otherwise it will refine the entire line.

      • configRefineLines

        public boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonLineToImage configRefineLines
        Configuration for refining with lines. Ignored if not used.

      • configRefineCorners

        public boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonCornersToImage configRefineCorners
        Configuration for refining with corners. Ignored if not used.

      • squareWidth

        public double squareWidth
        Physical width of each square on the calibration target
